text: Euspondylus nellycarrillae is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Peru. ==References== Category:Euspondylus Category:Reptiles of Peru Category:Endemic fauna of Peru Category:Reptiles described in 2004 Category:Taxa named by Gunther Köhler Category:Taxa named by Edgar Lehr
title: Euspondylus nellycarrillae
